short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that simplifies browsing by letting you easily hide or show images with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Blocker is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by giving you control over the display of images on web pages, providing you with a cleaner and distraction-free browsing environment.

1. Works Everywhere: Whether you're browsing social media sites like Instagram, Twitter, Reddit, Facebook, watching videos on YouTube or reading a blog, Image Blocker seamlessly integrates with every web page.

2. Reduce Distractions: Say goodbye to distracting images with a simple click. Image Blocker lets you hide images effortlessly, allowing you to focus on what matters most.

3. Conserve Bandwidth: By blocking unnecessary images, Image Blocker helps conserve bandwidth, ensuring faster page loading times and smoother browsing sessions.

4. Protect Your Privacy: Maintain your privacy while browsing online. Image Blocker allows you to hide images that may contain sensitive content, giving you peace of mind as you explore the web.

5. Customized Experience: With Image Blocker, you can tailor your browsing experience to suit your preferences. Hide images by default or choose to reveal them as needed, creating a personalized and enjoyable online environment.
